text: Robert Henry William Gray (born 21 January 1951) is a Scottish former footballer who played for Inverurie Loco Works, Torquay United and Keith, as a goalkeeper. ==References== Category:1951 births Category:Living people Category:Scottish footballers Category:Inverurie Loco Works F.C. players Category:Torquay United F.C. players Category:Keith F.C. players Category:English Football League players Category:Association football goalkeepers
title: Robert Gray (footballer, born 1951)
